name: Sarah Johnson
content: TAS Software transformed our business with their innovative SaaS solution. The results exceeded our expectations and we saw a 300% increase in team productivity within just 3 months.
image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'%3E%3Ccircle cx='50' cy='50' r='50' fill='%23e5e7eb'/%3E%3Ctext x='50%25' y='50%25' text-anchor='middle' dy='.3em' font-family='Inter' font-size='20' fill='%236b7280'%3ESJ%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Michael Chen
content: Their AI consulting helped us implement machine learning solutions that increased our efficiency by 300%. The team's expertise in AI and data science is truly exceptional.
image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'%3E%3Ccircle cx='50' cy='50' r='50' fill='%23e5e7eb'/%3E%3Ctext x='50%25' y='50%25' text-anchor='middle' dy='.3em' font-family='Inter' font-size='20' fill='%236b7280'%3EMC%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Emily Rodriguez
content: The digital marketing strategies they implemented boosted our online sales by 250% in just 6 months. Their expertise in SEO and social media marketing is outstanding.
image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'%3E%3Ccircle cx='50' cy='50' r='50' fill='%23e5e7eb'/%3E%3Ctext x='50%25' y='50%25' text-anchor='middle' dy='.3em' font-family='Inter' font-size='20' fill='%236b7280'%3EER%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: David Park
content: The mobile app exceeded our expectations. Users love the smooth experience and offline capabilities. We achieved 4.8/5 app store rating and 100k+ downloads in the first month.
image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'%3E%3Ccircle cx='50' cy='50' r='50' fill='%23e5e7eb'/%3E%3Ctext x='50%25' y='50%25' text-anchor='middle' dy='.3em' font-family='Inter' font-size='20' fill='%236b7280'%3EDP%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Lisa Wang
content: The digital marketing campaign transformed our online presence. We saw incredible growth in just 6 months with 250% increase in website traffic and 180% increase in lead generation.
image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'%3E%3Ccircle cx='50' cy='50' r='50' fill='%23e5e7eb'/%3E%3Ctext x='50%25' y='50%25' text-anchor='middle' dy='.3em' font-family='Inter' font-size='20' fill='%236b7280'%3ELW%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

name: Robert Taylor
content: The cloud migration was seamless. We achieved significant cost savings and improved performance with 40% reduction in infrastructure costs and 50% improvement in application performance.
